trans-unit.source: Represents an object that specifies the layout of a row of data.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> classes support the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListView> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter"></xref> class.
Positions the content of a row according to the size of the corresponding <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> objects.
The area to use to display the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content"></xref>.
The actual <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that is used to display the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content"></xref>.
Gets or sets the data content to display in a row.

The typical usage of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] is to place it in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a control.

The template binds the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> property to a property of the control by using [TemplateBinding Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/templatebinding-markup-extension.md).

The following example shows how to bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter> to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListViewItem> control.
[!code-xml[ListViewItemStyleSnippet#ControlTemplate](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ListViewItemStyleSnippet/CS/Window1.xaml#controltemplate)]
XAML Text Usage
See Remarks.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
The object that represents the content of a row.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content"></xref> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content%2A> dependency property.
Determines the area that is required to display the row.
The maximum area to use to display the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content"></xref>.
The actual <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> of the area that displays the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content"></xref>.
Returns a string representation of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content"></xref>.
A string that shows the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewRowPresenter.Content"></xref>.
